description: Auto-generated from Zod schemas. Available UI components for composing chat UI. Each node has: type (string), props (object), children (array of nodes, optional).

card-content.description: Main content area of a card

form.description: A form container. Wrap form fields inside.

name.description: Field name (maps to form data key)

input-field.description: A text input field inside a form

password-field.description: A password input field with show/hide toggle

maxLength.description: Number of OTP digits. Defaults to 6

file-upload-field.description: A file upload field with drag-and-drop

htmlFor.description: ID of the form element this label is for

avatar.description: Avatar image URL shown inside the chip

chip.description: A compact chip element with optional color dot or avatar

className.description: Tailwind classes to control width/height, e.g. 'h-4 w-[250px]'

showPercentage.description: Show percentage text. Defaults to true

progress-indicator.description: A progress bar or circular progress indicator

fallback.description: Fallback text (initials) when image is unavailable

avatar.description: A user avatar displaying an image, initials, or placeholder

avatar-list-item.description: An avatar with name and email, typically used in lists

objectFit.description: How the media fills its container. Defaults to 'cover'

media.description: An image or video media element

type.description: Allow one or multiple items open. Defaults to 'single'

accordion-trigger.description: Clickable header that toggles an accordion-item

children.description: Content revealed when the item is open

accordion-content.description: Collapsible content area of an accordion-item

defaultActiveTab.description: Value of the initially active tab

showContent.description: Show tab content panels. Defaults to true

children.description: Tab content panels (one per tab, in order)

tabs.description: A tabbed interface with switchable content panels

wrapper-card.description: A simple card wrapper with default padding and border

gradient-container.description: A container with a gradient background

carousel-item.description: A single slide inside a carousel

searchKey.description: URL query param key for the search value

debounceDelay.description: Debounce delay in ms. Defaults to 500

search-input.description: A search input with debounced query param binding

link-button.description: A button styled as a navigation link

button-link.description: An inline text link styled as a button

placeholder.description: Placeholder text. Defaults to 'Select an option'

children.description: The trigger element the tooltip wraps

tooltip.description: A tooltip that appears on hover over its child element

accessorKey.description: Key in the row data object

table.description: A data table with columns and rows

children.description: The element that opens the sheet

sheet-trigger.description: Trigger element that opens a sheet

showCloseButton.description: Show close button. Defaults to true

children.description: The element that opens the dropdown

dropdown-menu-trigger.description: Trigger element that opens a dropdown menu

dropdown-menu-content.description: Content panel of a dropdown menu

dropdown-menu-item.description: A single item inside a dropdown menu

dropdown-menu-separator.description: A visual separator between dropdown menu items

dropdown-menu-label.description: A non-interactive label inside a dropdown menu

children.description: The element that opens the popover

popover-trigger.description: Trigger element that opens a popover

align.description: Alignment relative to trigger. Defaults to 'center'

sideOffset.description: Offset from trigger in px. Defaults to 4

children.description: The element that triggers the context menu on right-click

context-menu-trigger.description: Trigger area for a context menu

context-menu-content.description: Content panel of a context menu

context-menu-item.description: A single item inside a context menu

context-menu-separator.description: A visual separator between context menu items
